bill.title: Behavioral Health Recovery Act
bill.description: Concerning the "Behavioral Health Recovery Act of 2021", and, in connection therewith, making an appropriation.

history.action: Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Health & Human Services

House Third Reading Passed with Amendments - Floor
Senate Considered House Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the President of the Senate
Signed by the Speaker of the House
